name: Fluffy Santa
description:
This year Alba is very busy, and important task to get presents falls on the shoulders of the rabbit. Brave rabbit heads off to the snowy world to get the best gifts for the cats.

Unfortunatelly, our rabbit is very small and can only hold one present at a time. But no worries, he is quick witted and can deliver color-matching presents to his favorite cats in no time!

He only needs to eat a lot of broccoli to get to high place (double jump, works once when space is pressed two times), carrot and apple to get to narrow places (works for 2 seconds after W/S was pressed).

Controls:

A/left arrow - go left

D/right arrow - go right

Space - jumpW - thin (Carrot)

S - flatten (Apple)

Space x2 - double jump (Broccoli)

Music:

https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Dee_Yan-Key
